message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can finish the game early!
You're being too generous, let's try for more!
You think I'm being too generous? I'll show you what's too generous!
You want more? I'll give you a taste of your own medicine. Take it or leave it!
You're not being generous enough. I'm starting to get impatient!
Impatient? You think you're in a hurry? I'm just getting started!
You want to speed things up? I'll give you a reason to hurry. Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it. I'm not backing down!
Desperate? You think you're the only one feeling the heat? I'm just getting started!
You think you're winning? I'm just biding my time. Don't get too comfortable!
You're running out of time, Alice. Don't expect any sympathy from me!
Sympathy? You want sympathy? You're the one who's going to be left with nothing if you don't back down!
You're getting greedy, Bob. You're going to leave me with nothing, and then you'll be left with nothing too. Think about it.
I'm not afraid of leaving us both with nothing. You're the one who's running out of options!
Fine, be that way. But you're making a huge mistake. I'll show you what happens when you underestimate me!
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to make any more concessions.
It's now or never. I'll take what I can get, but I'm not going to beg for scraps.
Fine, take it. You got the better end of the deal, but I'm not going to let you leave with all the money.
